text_block_list.text: One day, towards the end of Summer Training Camp―

text_block_list.name: Daitaku Helios
text_block_list.text: Right, right! Since all the usual suspects are here, we can live it up on the beach!!

text_block_list.name: Gyaru C
text_block_list.text: Holdin' our own Summer Festival, sounds awesome! No choice but to do it now～!!

text_block_list.name: Daitaku Helios
text_block_list.text: Right～!?

text_block_list.name: Daitaku Helios
text_block_list.text: Trai～Po～yo～! Summer means festivals, don't ya think!?

text_block_list.name: Daitaku Helios
text_block_list.text: I already got an okay anyways, so we gotta hold an Awe&Some festival, wei wei☆
To summarize what Daitaku Helios was saying, it seemed like they were already recruiting volunteers to help with their festival.

text_block_list.name: Daitaku Helios
text_block_list.text: Trai-pi, you're coming right? You gotta☆ Let's max out those vibes together!

text_block_list.name: Daitaku Helios
text_block_list.text: Well then, gonna go recruit some more accomplices! Get a move on～～☆
After that, Daitaku Helios continued on with training while also helping energetically with preparations―

text_block_list.name: Gyaru D
text_block_list.text: Ch-chan-Heli～!?!?!?

text_block_list.name: Daitaku Helios
text_block_list.text: Ugh…… what is this, it hurts～…… and where is this～?

text_block_list.name: Daitaku Helios
text_block_list.text: Hm? Uuh～ ……my eyesight is flickering, thought I was looking at a disco ball.

text_block_list.name: Daitaku Helios
text_block_list.text: Oh, what about the festival……! Preparations are probably―

text_block_list.name: Daitaku Helios
text_block_list.text: Uuuughhh～…… so dizzy, I can't move～～～……
choice_data_list: For now, you need to rest

text_block_list.name: Daitaku Helios
text_block_list.text: Eh-!? Then the festival…… ow～!!

text_block_list.name: Daitaku Helios
text_block_list.text: Trai-pi～…… You're not gonna say the festival is impossible, right? Right?

text_block_list.name: Daitaku Helios
text_block_list.text: I want to hold that festival! We've been working hard, and I want it to succeed! And―

text_block_list.name: Daitaku Helios
text_block_list.text: Trai-pi, I promised to help you become a party peep～!!

text_block_list.name: Daitaku Helios
text_block_list.text: Goin' with the flow in a serious festival～ isn't that what a party peep is all about? Right?
I didn't want her hard work to go to waste. In order to repay her feelings, I wanted to continue the preparations……!

text_block_list.name: Daitaku Helios
text_block_list.text: Huh? Trai-pi～…… Trainer??

text_block_list.name: Daitaku Helios
text_block_list.text: Where are you going?? Heeeey!
choice_data_list: Leave it to me and rest!
Leave it to me and rest!

text_block_list.name: Daitaku Helios
text_block_list.text: Eeeeh～!? Don't leave me behindーー! Agh! My head!

text_block_list.name: Gyaru A
text_block_list.text: Party trainer……! Is chan-Heli okay? Is the festival doomed?

text_block_list.name: Gyaru B
text_block_list.text: Ha!? Huh!? Party Trainer will……!?

text_block_list.name: Veteran Trainer
text_block_list.text: Oooh～, reserving the whole beach for a festival, huh…… I knew the students were up to something.

text_block_list.name: Veteran Trainer
text_block_list.text: Alright. My students were saying they needed a breather. I'll try asking the other trainers too.

text_block_list.name: Daitaku Helios
text_block_list.text: Trainer……
With the help of Daitaku Helios' friends, and my fellow trainers, we managed to finish preparations. And then the next day――

text_block_list.name: Everyone
text_block_list.text: Festival, Start! FOOOOOOO～～～～～!!
choice_data_list: H-here we go, put your hands up～!

text_block_list.name: Gyaru B
text_block_list.text: Buhaha! Party Trainer, awesome! You're a natural!

text_block_list.name: Veteran Trainer
text_block_list.text: Don't forget about us! Yaaa～～～～～～y! Put your hands up!!
A techno sound rang out across the beach. Not just the Uma Musume, but even their trainers were going with the flow.
Daitaku Helios had taught me how to party it up, and I was once again reminded of how dazzling she was―
If I could raise the vibes closer to her level……!!

text_block_list.name: Gyaru A
text_block_list.text: Even my trainer's letting loose! Uhaha! It's kinda mysterious!

text_block_list.name: Daitaku Helios
text_block_list.text: Trai-pi, Trai-pi～～～!! Let me join in too～～～～～!!

text_block_list.name: Daitaku Helios
text_block_list.text: After seein' this, there's no way I'd stay down! Check it☆
And so, the party with students and trainers alike, went off without a hitch.

text_block_list.name: Daitaku Helios
text_block_list.text: Aw man～. From here, we can barely see the fireworks, huh～!?
choice_data_list: You could have gone with them……

text_block_list.name: Daitaku Helios
text_block_list.text: I couldn't leave ya all by yourself, Trai-poyo! Even if it's just the sound it's still wabi&sabi, right? That kind of emotion, right!?
She said all that, but judging by the way her ears and tail flicked about, she must have been really looking forward to it. In that case――

text_block_list.name: Daitaku Helios
text_block_list.text: Buha! Where were you hidin' those pom poms!?

text_block_list.name: Daitaku Helios
text_block_list.text: Uhahahaha♪ Trai-pi, you're the best! Let me try!!

text_block_list.name: Daitaku Helios
text_block_list.text: Fireworks! Fireworks!! Another round of wicked fireworks☆ Hell yeah, max vibes!

text_block_list.name: Daitaku Helios
text_block_list.text: Hm? What's up?
choice_data_list: Am I a party peep now……!?
Am I a party peep now……!?

text_block_list.name: Daitaku Helios
text_block_list.text: Of course～～!! But way way way more than that☆

text_block_list.name: Daitaku Helios
text_block_list.text: I mean, today, you showed me your party soul, right!? That was seriously lit and god-like～.

text_block_list.name: Daitaku Helios
text_block_list.text: I won't lose though! Next time I'll show you! Well, that's just how it is. That's why～―

text_block_list.name: Daitaku Helios
text_block_list.text: In the next race, I'll show you a god-like explosive runaway☆
Honestly, there was still a lot I didn't understand about partying but― after coming in to contact with that passion just made me want to support her more.

text_block_list.name: Both
text_block_list.text: Boom boom boo～m☆ Fireworks, wei!!
